ShortDesc: Functional cerebellar atlas from fusion across task-based datasets
ReferencesAndLinks: Nettekoven, C. et al. A hierarchical atlas of the human cerebellum for functional precision mapping. BioRviv (2023). DOI:10.1101/2023.09.14.557689v1
LongDesc: Functional parcellation into 68 or 32 symmetric functional regions (matching between . A additional version with 128 regions that subdivides these regions spatially is available. The maps are based on the probabilistic integration of 7 task-based datasets. The color scheme reflects the functional similarity of different regions. The paper is not final.
